devdoc.author: Shumpei Koike - <shumpei.koike@bridges.inc>

acceptOffer(uint256,string).details: Accepts an offer by the Media.

params.tokenMetadata: string of the NFT token metadata

adId(string,uint256,uint256).details: Returns ID based on the space metadata, display start timestamp, and      display end timestamp. These three makes it the unique.

params.displayEndTimestamp: uint256 of the end timestamp for the display
params.displayStartTimestamp: uint256 of the start timestamp for the display

balance().details: Returns the balacne deposited on the proxy contract.

bid(uint256).details: Bids to participate in an auction.

buy(uint256).details: Buys the token that is defined as the specific period on an ad space.      The price of the token is fixed.

buyBasedOnTime(uint256).details: Buys the token that is defined as the specific period on an ad space.      The price is decreasing as time goes by.

deletePeriod(uint256).details: Deletes a period and its token.      If there is any users locking the fund for the sale, the amount would be transfered      to the user when deleting the period.

deny(uint256,string).details: Denies the submitted proposal, mentioning what is the problem.

params.reason: string of the reason why it is rejected

display(string).details: Displays the ad content that is approved by the media owner.

params.title: string of the title of the instance

newPeriod(string,string,uint256,uint256,.details: Create a new period for a space. This function requires some params      to decide which kinds of pricing way and how much price to get started.

params.displayEndTimestamp: uint256 of the end timestamp for the display
params.displayStartTimestamp: uint256 of the start timestamp for the display
params.minPrice: uint256 of the minimum price to sell it out
params.saleEndTimestamp: uint256 of the end timestamp for the sale

newSpace(string).details: Creates a new space for the media account.

offerPeriod(string,uint256,uint256).details: Offers to buy a period that the sender requests.

params.displayEndTimestamp: uint256 of the end timestamp for the display
params.displayStartTimestamp: uint256 of the start timestamp for the display

propose(uint256,string).details: Proposes the metadata to the token you bought.      Users can propose many times as long as it is accepted.

receiveToken(uint256).details: Receives the token you bidded if you are the successful bidder.

tokenIdsOf(string).details: Returns tokenIds tied with the space metadata

updateMedia(address,string).details: Updates the media EOA and the metadata.

withdraw().details: Withdraws the fund deposited to the proxy contract.

devdoc.title: AdManager - manages ad spaces and its periods to sell them to users.
